org.smartfrog.sfcore.utils
Class WorkflowThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      org.smartfrog.sfcore.utils.SmartFrogThread
          org.smartfrog.sfcore.utils.WorkflowThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, Executable
Direct Known Subclasses:
TupleReaderThread
public class WorkflowThread
extends SmartFrogThread

The Workflow thread will terminate its owner when finishing.

Constructor Detail

WorkflowThread

public WorkflowThread(Prim owner,
                      boolean workflowTermination,
                      java.lang.Object notifyObject)
Allocates a new SmartFrogThread object.

Parameters:
owner - owner obj
notifyObject - to notify afterwards. If null, "this" is used
workflowTermination - should workflow (optional) termination rules be used? If false, this thread always terminates the parent when finished

WorkflowThread

public WorkflowThread(Prim owner,
                      boolean workflowTermination)
Create a basic thread. Notification is bound to a local notification object.

Parameters:
owner - owner thread
workflowTermination - is workflow termination expected

WorkflowThread

public WorkflowThread(Prim owner,
                      Executable target,
                      boolean workflowTermination)
Create a basic thread bound to a runnable

Parameters:
owner - owner prim
target - the object whose run method is called.
workflowTermination - workflow policy

getOwner

public Prim getOwner()

getOwnerID

public Reference getOwnerID()

isWorkflowTermination

public boolean isWorkflowTermination()

run

public void run()
Runs the SmartFrogThread.execute() method, catching any exception it throws and storing it away for safe keeping After the run, the notify object is notified, and we trigger a workflow termination

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
Overrides:
run in class SmartFrogThread

processRunResults

protected void processRunResults()

createTerminationRecord

protected TerminationRecord createTerminationRecord()
Create a TR from the termination message of getTerminationMessage() and any exception thrown -the latter determines whether or not the TR is considered normal or not

Returns:
a termination record

aboutToTerminate

protected void aboutToTerminate(TerminationRecord tr)
this is an override point. The TR is passed in for examination and editing. The base implementation does nothing.

Parameters:
tr - the termination record about to be passed up

getTerminationMessage

protected java.lang.String getTerminationMessage()
Override point: the termination message

Returns:
WORKER_THREAD_COMPLETED or WORKER_THREAD_FAILED depending on the outcome
